caseTitle: Mian Azam Waheed v. The Collector of Customs thr. Addl. Collector of Customs, Model Customs Collectorate of Appraisement (East), Karachi
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 25, 25A, 25D, 81 & 193 of Customs Act, 1969. (2) Invoking the writ jurisdiction of High Court without availing alternate remedies vis-à-vis the doctrine of exhaustion of remedies.      (3) Merger of interim orders into final orders.
